message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product for you today! It's a rare find, and I'm confident it will be a great addition to your collection. Are you interested in purchasing it for $10000?
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll take a chance and buy it. Fingers crossed it's a high-quality product!
